projects.brief: I wanted to automate reloading of my Chrome browser when working in local dev environment.
projects.outcome: Utilising opensource code and just playing around, I built a chrome browser extension to monitor changes in local html, css and js files. The browser reloads on detected changes

projects.brief: The client wanted to showcase a collection of video projects with the ability to self-update/maintain the site content.  The client requested secure backend access with fast page speeds and SEO optimisation.
projects.outcome: I built a custom Wordpress site to offer all the advantages of the popular CMS with bespoke inclusions to allow for the client layouts.

projects.brief: Customise homepage to suit client design
projects.outcome: Wordpress custom theme built to work with existing database.

projects.brief: Open source project throwing back to the classic retro arcade game.
projects.outcome: A fun HTML page with javascript and css

projects.brief: I needed to modernise the existing business site with secure e-commerce features and updatable content.
projects.outcome: A php site with mySQL backend, implemented google tag manager & twitter api feed.
Simple HTML and CSS site build. Before Javascript was a thing and before UX centered design swept the world.
